home.title: Dance Point Luboń
home.text_1: A dance school where children, teenagers, and adults can develop their dance skills and actively spend their free time.
home.text_2: Dance Point Luboń is not just a dance school - it's a community, energy, and a space for growth. Join us and feel how dance can change your life.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.note: The schedule may differ from the current one. Please check with the administrator.
